title: Lord Daniel calls on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 1 (APP): Lord Daniel Hannan, member of the United Kingdom Board of Trade, Saturday called on Prime Minister Imran Khan.
Governor Punjab Muhammad Sarwar was also present during the meeting.
Lord Hannan praised prime ministerâ€™s vision for a Green Pakistan that included 10 billion trees tsunami programme, wildlife conservation measures, national parks and environmental protection initiatives.
Lord Hannan said that these initiatives were being globally acknowledged.
Lord Daniel is currently on a visit to Pakistan on the invitation of Governor Punjab.
